items: Custom Website Design & Development: Build responsive, modern websites tailored to your brand.
Landing Pages & Portfolios: Fast-loading, visually appealing pages to showcase products or services.
Single Page Applications (SPA): Dynamic web apps using React or other modern frameworks.
UI/UX Optimization: Improve usability, navigation, and accessibility for a better user experience.
Interactive Web Features: Animations, interactive forms, sliders, and custom components.
Mobile-First & Responsive Design: Ensure websites look perfect on desktops, tablets, and phones.
API Development: Build REST or GraphQL APIs for web and mobile applications.
Database Integration & Management: Connect websites to SQL, NoSQL, or cloud databases like Supabase or Firebase.
User Authentication & Security: Email/password login, social login, and magic link authentication.
Server-Side Logic & Automation: Handle business logic, workflows, and automated processes.
Complete Web Applications: End-to-end development from front-end design to back-end functionality.
E-commerce Websites: Product catalogs, shopping carts, checkout systems, and admin dashboards.
SaaS Platforms & Web Tools: Subscription-based apps or internal business tools.
Admin Dashboards & Analytics Panels: Manage content, inventory, or user data efficiently.
Progressive Web Apps (PWA): Apps that work offline and can be installed on devices like native apps.
Performance & SEO Optimization: Speed, accessibility, and search engine optimization.
Website Maintenance & Updates: Bug fixes, new feature implementation, and tech stack upgrades.
Migration Services: Move websites to new frameworks, servers, or hosting solutions.
Custom Components & Reusable Libraries: Create modular code for developers or teams.
Technical Consultation: Recommend the best tech stack and development approach for your project.
Code Review & Optimization: Improve existing code quality, maintainability, and performance.
Workshops & Training: Teach React, Node.js, Supabase, or general web development skills.

note: I work closely with clients to understand their goals and deliver web solutions that are fast, secure, and visually appealing. Let's build something amazing together!
